Html:
Hey guys I just finished the tutorial and am wondering a few things if I can get some help

Is there any information on adding:

1.  a current/past orders list in the admin section?

2. A way for a user to manage his profile such as past orders, changing email/ passwords etc.

3. a log out button that disappears if a user is logged in?

 

Im new to MVC so any advise would be appreciated, I can do all of those parts in .net but Mvc is a so much different. 

 

Thanks in advance

This would be nice, however, the user profile table is just for show and doesn't actually tie data together at all. In fact, you can't use WebSecurity and SimpleMembership in any kind of useful way, so you need to write your own and pretty much disregard the registration methods outlined here.
